original_text: And when his armor-bearer saw that Saul was dead, he also fell upon his sword and died with him.
korean_text: 무기를 든 자가 사울이 죽음을 보고 자기도 자기 칼 위에 엎드러져 그와 함께 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: And when his armor-bearer saw that Saul was dead,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 병기 든 자는 사울이 죽은 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: he also fell upon his sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그도 자기 칼 위로 몸을 던져
